pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk9:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhipitvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
